Subject: Albania
Description: Albania has one of the largest shares of renewable energy in its energy mix in South-East Europe.

Subject: Policy Landscape and Targets
Description: The Policy Landscape and Targets focus on renewable energy in Albania.

Subject: Albania
Description: Utility-sale projects are auctioned and financed through a Contract for Differences (CfD) scheme

Subject: Albania
Description: Net-metering is eligible for small to medium-size solar and wind systems of up to 500 kW

Subject: Albania
Description: Certain customs duty exemptions apply for machinery and equipment used in the construction of all power plants, including both renewable and conventional power plants

Subject: Renewable Energy
Description: A revision of the existing support landscape for RE in Albania would foster the deployment of small-scale projects in the country.

Subject: Renewable Energy
Description: Thoroughly developed planning and financial instruments such as Power Purchase Agreements would inspire confidence and stimulate international investment in renewable energy in Albania.
